item.title: Jimmy Carter Was a Terrible President — and an Even Worse Former President
item.description: The truth is that historians have not been harsh enough.

item.title: Jimmy Carter, R.I.P.
item.description: The 39th president had a personality that leaned into his travails.

item.title: Stuck in a Rut? Be Social — and Stay Local
item.description: Focusing on joyful pursuits with others helped me fall back in love with my hometown.

item.title: Civic Education Is Making a Much-Needed Comeback
item.description: The study of American history and government is undergoing an unprecedented renewal.

item.title: The Shamelessness of Ta-Nehisi Coates
item.description: Recognition of what Coates is really up to — in The Message and elsewhere — should chasten those who have treated him as the moral conscience of the W...
